name: aliengypt
description:
move with wasd or with the arrow keys

This is a little game made for the mini jam 61. The theme was ancient Egypt and the limitation was combine 2 conflicting ideas.

The aliens that landed on earth recently are polluting the Nile, and your farm is dying.

You decide to set up a plan to kill the aliens, but you don't have enough money.

So you buy a boat and start going from pyramid to pyramid, upgrading your boat with alien technology in the meantime.

2 conflicting ideas because aliens and egypt don't go together

thanks to nomisvdp for the programming, Marck and kozimobo for the art and kozimobo for the music!
